title: Saturday Mash-Up Live!
overview: Saturday mornings will never be the same again, as the interactive entertainment show, Saturday Mash-Up! crash-lands onto CBBC and BBC Two.Fronted by Yasmin Evans, Jonny Nelson and Hacker T. Dog, Saturday Mash-Up! marks the riotous return of children's live programming to weekend television. Over two awesome hours our cheeky hosts will bring you the freshest music, fun guests and fantastic competitions for viewers to get involved with.
